title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Business Mathematics Anchored Learning Design—Problem-Centered Online Module

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Cultivation of problem-solving skills using mathematical models (equations, functions, percentages) in real-world business contexts (sales analysis, budget planning).
Acquisition of the ability to systematically restructure business problems by extracting latent data within video scenarios.

Learners will select ≥2 supply chain optimization or cost calculation problems within 1 week, create a problem decomposition map (≥5 stages), choose appropriate mathematical tools (linear programming/regression analysis), design applicable models, and submit result reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
